trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> classe é usada para representar uma linha individual em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle tem um tipo de linha designado.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os tipos de linha diferente.

trans-unit.source: Row type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de linha

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: The data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when there are no records to display.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle quando não houver registros a exibir.

trans-unit.source: The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: A linha de rodapé no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Linha de cabeçalho no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha de pager no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: To determine the row type of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o tipo de linha de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto também tem um estado associado a ele.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: State value
trans-unit.target: Valor de estado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto está no modo de inserção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto estiver no estado normal (padrão).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: To determine the state of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o estado de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> de objeto, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control displays the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> property in a data row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle exibe o conteúdo de seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> propriedade em uma linha de dados.

trans-unit.source: To access the data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar a linha de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current data item in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice do item de dados na fonte de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as células individuais do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using one of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: Se uma célula contiver controles, você pode recuperar um controle de célula usando um dos seguintes métodos:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell to retrieve the control at a specific index.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> coleção da célula para recuperar o controle em um índice específico.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to retrieve the control, if the control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property set.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> método da célula para recuperar o controle, se o controle tiver seu <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> conjunto de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to retrieve a control from a cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o método preferencial para recuperar um controle de uma célula.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> de classe, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to retrieve an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the item row.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto que representa a linha do item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> controls are declared in the edit and item templates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> os controles são declarados nos modelos de item e de edição.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item in the data source.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> enumeration values.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> enumeration values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> class.
Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> classe.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado pelo `itemIndex` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado pelo `rowType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor especificado pelo `rowState` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the data item displayed from the data source.
The index of the data item displayed from the data source.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item de dados exibido da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the data item.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.ItemIndex%2A> propriedade para determinar o índice do item de dados.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
The event data.
Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
<see langword="true" /> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The HTML text writer object that receives the control content.
Renders the control to the specified HTML writer.
Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> propriedade para determinar o estado da linha.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O estado pode ser uma combinação bit a bit dos valores na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: State value
trans-unit.target: Valor de estado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto está no modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto está no modo de inserção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is in its normal, read-only state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto está no estado normal, somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o estado de uma linha antes de executar uma operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow" /> object.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> propriedade para determinar o tipo de linha que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> objeto representa.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different row type values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os valores de tipo de linha diferente.

trans-unit.source: Row type
trans-unit.target: Tipo de linha

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: The data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de linha de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Linha de dados vazios no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when there are no records to display.
trans-unit.target: A linha de dados vazio é exibida em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle quando não houver registros a exibir.

trans-unit.source: The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: A linha de rodapé no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Linha de cabeçalho no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha de pager no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: A separator row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha de separador a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> controle.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade normalmente é usada para determinar o tipo da linha antes de executar uma operação.
